title: How to Make a Crush Grape Float

steps.headline: Gather all of the ingredients, which are listed above, as well as the things you'll need, which are listed below.
Scoop out one scoop of your favorite flavor of ice cream and place it into the drinking glass.
Add in the Grape Crush.
steps.description: Again, the amount of this soda that you use doesn't really matter, but try to make sure that you leave enough room for the club soda.

steps.headline: Pour the club soda into the mix.
steps.description: Once you have poured the club soda into the drinking glass, stir up the mixture using the spoon for a few seconds before serving.

steps.headline: Place a straw into the drinking glass and serve the drink immediately.

text: Gather all of the ingredients, which are listed above, as well as the things you'll need, which are listed below.  Scoop out one scoop of your favorite flavor of ice cream and place it into the drinking glass.  Add in the Grape Crush. Again, the amount of this soda that you use doesn't really matter, but try to make sure that you leave enough room for the club soda. Pour the club soda into the mix. Once you have poured the club soda into the drinking glass, stir up the mixture using the spoon for a few seconds before serving. Place a straw into the drinking glass and serve the drink immediately.  Enjoy!
